description:
If you like your guys, lean, boyish, and twink-like, then Justin is perfect for ya.
I don't know where these little guys get their big dicks, but Justin is packin' for sure!
He lives in a small town, and most of his experiences have been "fooling around" with the straight boys he meets at parties.
He was all nervous shy smiles to start with, but once he got into the solo, I think he completely forgot I was in the room.
I totally dug working with him, and I've got plans to hook him up with some of the other models on the site.
title: Justin Bundy - Solo
